column4: Hey, I'm having problems with getting onto the internet (or even my network) in ubuntu 8.04. It worked fine in 7.04, but now it doesn't. The physical connections are all there (I can get online with vista), just in ubuntu it doesn't work. Any ideas?
details please...type of card, way of connecting etc
Striker Extreme Nforce 6 motherboard with 1 of 2 wired connections being used.
still doesn't work after that though.
post the output of "cat /var/log/syslog|grep dhcp" on pastebin
unlikely, unless you have done something after the install that might have caused it
see this "....Exobyte dhclient: can't create /var/lib/dhcp3/dhclient.leases: Permission denied"
you have a permissions problem, but i'm not sure what will resolve it
do you think reinstalling would help?
wait for someone else to answer
